title: 1545: Bad Fitness Advice That’s Actually Good
description:
In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin cover seven pieces of fitness advice that good but not for the reason most people believe.

  • Why some of the things that come out of the fitness industry are based on RESULTS. (1:21)
  • Seven pieces of bad fitness advice that are actually good, but not for the reasons most people believe.
  • #1 – If you want to get lean, do not eat past 6 pm. (4:35) 
  • #2 - Doing fasted cardio first thing in the morning. (13:05) 
  • #3 - Doing high reps burns fat and low reps build muscle. (18:00) 
  • #4 - You need to eat a TON of protein to build muscle. (25:24)
  • #5- Chasing “the pump.” (33:11)
  • #6 – Drinking a gallon of water a day. (36:44)
  • #7 – Targeting the different “angels” of the muscle. (38:18)
